description: Contains customer activity and engagement events. Tracks various user actions and behaviors that can be used to predict churn. Higher event frequency typically indicates better engagement.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: Foreign key reference to customers table

columns.name: subscription_id
columns.description: Foreign key reference to subscriptions table

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event or user action performed

columns.name: event_value
columns.description: Numeric value associated with the event (e.g., transaction amount, usage metric)

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the event record was created
